author: TravisEz13
body:
For certain testing, we need builds with symbols.  Adding the ability to package builds with symbols for this purpose

I enabled for all packaging types except AppImage.  

I forced the option to add `symbols` into the package name, except for Release/Linux (the Linux Release configuration).  This will allow this special package type to be easily identified.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: I changed this to only allow packaging with symbols for now by removing crossgen from the build.  I've updated the PR Description.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @adityapatwardhan The comments are addressed. Can you please take another look?

title: Add ability to package non-release packages
